name: Grick
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage.
descriptions: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

actions.name: Tentacles.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Beak.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
